welcome_message_body: Welcome to Port Jervis, a charming city known for its picturesque views and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sullivan County International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sullivan County International Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orange County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
